Maverick AV Solutions with: Lenovo

Series One Google Meet Room Kits

Lenovo creates powerful, compact solutions for meeting room collaboration. Enable rapid Google Meets through three preconfigured kits, designed for small, medium or large meeting rooms. Featuring a smart camera, smart audio bar, mic pod, Meet compute system and touch controller, all prepackaged and delivered as a single solution for Google Meet Rooms.

ThinkSmart Hub (Microsoft Teams Room)

This meeting device is making meetings more efficient than ever. Built on the Microsoft Teams platform with 8th Gen Intel® Core™ processors, the Thinksmart Hub has a slim design with a sleek display, speakers and microphones. It’s innovative single-cable mechanism makes connectivity simple. It’s still scalable across room sizes and features one-touch meeting start, for the best possible Microsoft Teams experience.

ThinkSmart View

ThinkSmart View is a collaborative smart device that works from an individual’s workspace, tackling administrative tasks that waste a PC’s resources. The device works with a PC to “divide and conquer” so you can simultaneously use your PC for productivity and ThinkSmart View for administrative tasks. Personal productivity assistant for the workplace.

Next level Teams Rooms

Lenovo ThinkSmart Core, Controller and Bose Videobar™ VB1

Designed for huddle spaces and small-to medium-sized conference rooms. This is an ideal solution for getting meeting rooms up and running quickly with premium audio and video and seamless, comprehensive endpoint compute and control.
